ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: stuck on luclin quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re welcome. :) ... Heehee. I know I m gonna be so pissed when someone finally figures out what the hell darkclaw claws are for -- I have sold soooooo
ygData.messageBody:
--- stotty_k <karen@...> wrote:
> Thank you Hanna, Tracy and Bebbinn.

You're welcome. :)
>
> Cant belive now how stupid I was, had a whole stash
> of those leaves
> banked away incase i needed them? for some reason
> had it in my head
> the leaves were a ground spawn not a drop so never
> even gave them a
> thought, DuH.

Heehee. I know I'm gonna be so pissed when someone
finally figures out what the hell darkclaw claws are
for -- I have sold soooooo many of them! They're
probably going to be for some kick-ass quest.

-Hanna
